lessons.japanese: 近頃は地震が頻繁で不気味だ。
lessons.english: The recent frequency of earthquakes makes us nervous.

lessons.japanese: 電車はバスより頻繁に来ます。
lessons.english: Trains come more often than buses.

lessons.japanese: メアリーは、もっと頻繁に母親を手伝うと約束した。
lessons.english: Mary promised her mother that she would help her more often.

lessons.japanese: また、温度が高いと、潤滑剤を頻繁に交換する必要がある。
lessons.english: Also, increased temperatures may require that lubricants be changed frequently.

lessons.japanese: フォイエルバッハの作品は頻繁に言及されている。
lessons.english: The work of Feuerbach is frequently referred to.

lessons.japanese: どんなに頻繁に言っても、彼女は同じ間違いをしてばかりいる。
lessons.english: No matter how often I tell her, she keeps making the same mistake.

lessons.japanese: できるだけ頻繁に辞書を引きなさい。
lessons.english: Refer to the dictionary as often as possible.

lessons.japanese: そんなに頻繁に遅刻するなら私は君を首にしなければならない。
lessons.english: I will have to fire you if you come late so often.

lessons.japanese: そこでは台風が秋に頻繁に起こっている。
lessons.english: Typhoons are frequent there in fall.

lessons.japanese: 今年も、アマチュア音楽家の定期演奏会が頻繁に開催される。
lessons.english: This year too there are many regular concerts for amateur musicians being held.
